mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) AS userId, DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y%m%d') addTime FROM user GROUP BY addTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(login_name) loginName,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y%m%d') addTime FROM login_log GROUP BY addTime DESC
SELECT sum(order_amount) orderAmount,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y%m%d') addTime FROM order_info WHERE pay_status=2 GROUP BY addTime DESC
SELECT sum(order_amount) orderAmount,DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y%m%d') addTime FROM order_info WHERE pay_status=1 GROUP BY addTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(a.pid) count,a.name from organization o JOIN (SELECT b.id,a.id pid,a.name FROM region a JOIN region b ON a.id = b.pid where a.lel in(1,2) and b.lel in(1,2))a on a.id=o.region group by a.pid
